title: Flight of the navigator
creator_credit: PSO, Viking Film, New Star Entertainment, Robby Wald, Dimitri Villard and Randal Kleiser
brief_description: A 12 year old boy is mysteriously abducted by an alien ship and returns to earth eight years later, still only 12. He now possesses great navigational powers that enable him to fly his spaceship anywhere he desires. Along with the robotic commander Max and mascot Puckmarin, David encounters an adventure of extraterrestrial proportions. Based on the story by Mark H. Baxter. Cast includes Joey Cramer, Sarah Jessica Parker, Veronica Cartwright, Cliff de Young, Matt Adler, Howard Hesseman.
